item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me at Conga's for a great night of dancing and learning with Metamovements !!

'Congas Salsa Saturdays, brought to you by DJ Hernan. A stunning open space for dancing, right in the heart of Harvard Square with delicious Tapas, full bar & plenty of street parking or a $8 lot just one block away, T & Bus accessible."

Salsa Lesson 9:00pm w/Carlos and Jen from Metamovements- No partner needed - Music til' 2am with DJ's Hernan & D. Martinez

Dress Code: Simply, elegant, no sports wear. $10, $12 w/ lesson

Try to be there by 8:30 so that you could meet the other members of the group. If you get there late, my cell number is 617-435-4233. I will be wearing a black fedora hat, should be easy to find.


See you soon!!

-Angel
Ass. Org.

CONGAS
1 ELIOT ST. CAMBRIDGE, MA 02138
More info www.bostonsalsero.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Conga's Salsa Saturdays with Metamovements !!!!
